meanings.definition: Cyclases: enzymes that catalyze the formation of cyclic compounds from their linear precursors.
meanings.sent1: The cyclases in our bodies help create important compounds for our health.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study cyclases to understand how cyclic compounds are produced in nature.
meanings.sent3: The cyclases at the chemical party were busy turning linear molecules into circular ones.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like cyclases, transforming ordinary ideas into unique masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The cyclases worked tirelessly, spinning the linear threads of molecules into intricate rings.
